messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian President Vladimir Putin says Moscow will retaliate if the Unites States take measures to pressure Russian media outlets. Putin: "As soon as we see steps (to pressure) our media, there will immediately be an answer"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russia ready to develop new weapons systems, both nuclear and non-nuclear, Putin says. Russia will respond immediately and symmetrically if the United States quits the intermediate-range nuclear forces treaty.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kurdish forces withdrew from the city on the border with Iran to avoid clashing with Iraqi forces. Khanaqin lies outside the official boundaries of the semi-autonomous Kurdistan region.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Lou Jiwei is chairman of the national council for the social security fund. He was speaking on the sidelines of the 19th China Communist Party Congress.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
London will remain the world s leading financial center, a spokesman for British Prime Minister Theresa May said. He was asked about comments by Goldman Sachs chief executive Lloyd Blankfein.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A stone fragment, probably a piece of marble from the top of a column, fell on a tourist visiting Florence. The church where Renaissance master Michelangelo Buonarotti is buried has been closed by police. The fire service identified the victim as a male Spaniard in his 50s.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Vladimir Putin says U.S. not fulfilling its obligations under nuclear and chemical weapons treaties. Putin says despite calls to cooperate on global issues, the United States had demonstrated a  selfishness.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian President Vladimir Putin called on Thursday for a reform of the United Nations. He said the changes of the global organization should to be carried out gradually. There is no alternative to the U.N. today, Putin said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson will visit Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Pakistan, India and Switzerland. His trip, scheduled for Oct. 20-27, also marks Tillerson s first visit to South Asia as secretary. In Geneva, he will meet several international organizations to discuss refugees.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. concerned at reports of forced displacement of civilians, mainly Kurds. U.N.: Looting and destruction of houses and businesses in northern Iraq. urges Government of Iraq to take every action to halt any violations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte says Britain should clear up financial commitments. Rutte: "Theresa May has to come up with more clarity on what she means by  other commitments"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Austria s likely next chancellor said on Thursday that EU membership talks with Turkey must be stopped. Sebastian Kurz, whose conservative OVP party won the most votes in Sunday s parliamentary election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

French President Emmanuel Macron called on the United Nations  IAEA atomic watchdog body to ensure the strict compliance of the 2015 Iran nuclear deal. Macron met International Atomic Energy Agency director general Yukiya Amano.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Theresa May says she will tell fellow EU leaders of ambitious plans for progress. She says she wants to see an urgency in reaching an agreement on citizens rights.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
French President Emmanuel Macron says EU nations are united in their stance on Brexit. He says they are behind the bloc s negotiator Michel Barnier in talks on Britain s withdrawal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Kurdistan Regional Government (KRG) never intended to engage in a war with the Iraqi army, a minister says. Falah Mustafa Bakir, head of the KRG department of foreign relations, says there is a need for dialogue. Kurdish Peshmerga forces have retreated to positions they held in northern Iraq in June 2014.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kurdish forces have not withdrawn from the Khurmala oil field, Erbil-based Rudaw TV said. Iraqi forces on Monday seized the Kirkuk province from Kurdish forces who deployed there in 2014.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kurdish authorities accused of removing equipment at Bai Hasan and Avana oil fields. Iraq won't be able to restore Kirkuk s oil output to last week s levels before Sunday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

New Zealand Labour Party leader Jacinda Ardern says cabinet positions will be discussed on Friday. The position of deputy prime minister has been offered to Winston Peters. The deal marks the end of nearly a decade of center-right National governments.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kurdish Regional Government Vice President Kosrat Rasul arrested. Rasul allegedly said Iraqi troops which took over the city of Kirkuk were  occupying forces.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Jeremy Corbyn, leader of the British opposition Labour Party, says he will fight any attempt by the government to turn Britain into a tax haven. He was speaking to a meeting of the socialists and democrats in the European Parliament in Brussels.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Malaysia negotiating with U.S.-based seabed exploration firm Ocean Infinity. MH370 vanished three years ago somewhere in the southern Indian Ocean. Malaysia, Australia and China ended a deep-sea search for the plane in January.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Iraq warns oil companies against signing contracts with Iraqi Kurdistan. Russian state-controlled oil company Rosneft signed an agreement to put production sharing agreements into force.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov tells Iran's Abbas Araqchi Moscow remains committed to Iran nuclear deal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Gupta family, a trio of Indian-born businessmen, are under scrutiny for their close ties to South African President Jacob Zuma. Britain s Financial Conduct Authority separately said it is in contact with StanChart and HSBC.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The quake struck 682 km (424 miles) off Japan s island of Kyushu. There were no immediate reports of damage or casualties.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
About 100,000 Kurds have fled Kirkuk, fearing unrest, officials say. About 18,000 families have taken shelter in the cities of Erbil and Sulaimaniya.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British Prime Minister Theresa May will meet former U.S. President Bill Clinton on Thursday. Clinton played a central role in brokering peace in Northern Ireland during his time as president. A power-sharing administration collapsed in January and opposing sides have since been unable to break the deadlock.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

New Zealand Green Party leader James Shaw says he is confident of reaching an agreement with Labour and New Zealand First. The incoming Labour-New Zealand First coalition needs the Greens to commit to a confidence and supply agreement in parliament.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China says it hopes the United States can abandon its bias and see China objectively. U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson has called for a broader alliance to check Beijing's influence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Prime Minister and Vice-President of the United Arab Emirates, said in a tweet a government reshuffle will be announced later on Thursday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

More than 40 lawmakers urge the Trump administration to reimpose U.S. travel bans on Myanmar s military leaders. They also call for targeted sanctions against those responsible for a crackdown on the country s Rohingya Muslim minority.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Catalonia s regional government is not planning to hold a snap election following a disputed independence referendum. Raul Romeva told a new conference in Brussels on Wednesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Maduro said that Spain was holding political prisoners. Two Catalan civic leaders accused by prosecutors of sedition related to protests.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson will visit Pakistan next week during an Asian trip. The trip will also take him to the country s rival India.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Video purporting to show Tahrir al-Sham leader Abu Mohamad al-Golani. Russian Defence Ministry said Golani had lost an arm and was in critical condition. Russia is an ally of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Madrid has given Thursday as a deadline for the regional government to back down from a symbolic independence declaration. If Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy moves to apply direct rule on Thursday it will take between three and five days for regional autonomy to be effectively suspended.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
If confirmed, she will replace Boerge Brende, who last month was appointed president of the World Economic Forum. Conservative Prime Minister Erna Solberg would promote Ine Eriksen Soereide.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
European Council President Donald Tusk noted promising progress in talks. Tusk said he would propose to 27 EU leaders to open internal preparations for the second phase of negotiations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Flames swept through an illegal firecracker workshop in the eastern Indian state of Odisha. The fire broke out as workers were making crackers for Thursday s celebrations of Diwali, the Hindu festival of lights.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The areas were evacuated by Kurdish Peshmerga fighters before the arrival of the Iraqi forces. The Peshmerga had taken them over the past three years as part of the war against Islamic State militants.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Gen. Ratko Mladic is accused of crimes including genocide. Allegedly oversaw massacre of more than 8,000 men and boys at Srebrenica.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Explosion in southern Swedish town of Helsingborg causes damage to police station. Nobody was injured in the explosion, which occurred shortly after midnight local time. It is unclear what caused the detonation,  police said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Opposition leader Raila Odinga calls on Wednesday for a mass protest on Oct. 26. The date is the date the country is due to hold a presidential vote that he is boycotting. October 26 will be the biggest demonstration of them all, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Baghdad International Airport welcomed the first Saudi plane after a 27-year break. Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates are both wooing Baghdad.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Israel must halt new building plans for settler homes in the West Bank, EU says. EU says such settlements threatened any future peace deal with the Palestinians. EU maintains that lands Israel has occupied since 1967 are not part of internationally recognized borders of Israel.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iranian military chief of staff General Mohammad Baqeri said the Islamic Republic would not accept Israeli violations of Syria. It is not acceptable for the Zionist regime to violate Syria anytime it wants, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Wafula Chebukati says it was difficult to guarantee the election would be free and fair. He invited political leaders in the country to discuss impediments to the vote. The Supreme Court ordered a repeat presidential poll on Oct. 26.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Visa operations were mutually suspended by the two countries on Oct. 8. A delegation from the United States arrived in Turkey on Tuesday to discuss the resolution of the crisis.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian President Vladimir Putin had a telephone conversation with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. The two leaders also discussed the situation in Syria and the referendum in Iraq s Kurdistan.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Tran Thi Xuan, 41, was arrested in the northern province of Ha Tinh on Tuesday. The website did not give details of the alleged crime. Despite sweeping economic reforms, the Communist Party tolerates little criticism.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said Tehran would not accept pressure from European countries. European interference in Iran s missile programme and our regional policy is not acceptable, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The chances of Northern Ireland s political parties restoring a power-sharing agreement in Northern Ireland are not positive. Talks in the last few days have stalled, Britain s minister for the region said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
South Korea is considering levying its own sanctions on North Korea. No decision has been made yet, South Korea's vice foreign minister said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkish Foreign Minister Mevlut Cavusoglu says on-going visa crisis with U.S. is unnecessary. He says two allies need to solve the issue with mutual understanding. He said it was not right to punish people unrelated to the tension.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China considers democratic and self-ruled Taiwan to be a wayward province. Any attempt to separate the island from China would be thwarted.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
New Zealand First holds the balance of power after an inconclusive election. Neither the ruling National Party nor the opposition Labour Party won enough seats to be able to form a government.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China overtook the United States as the world s biggest emitter of greenhouse gases in 2007. China must cooperate with other nations to tackle climate change, President Xi Jinping says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Chinese President Xi Jinping said China will stick to supply side structural reform. Xi made the comments in a speech at the beginning of a Communist Party congress.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China regards self-ruled and democratic Taiwan as a wayward territory. President Xi Jinping says the principle of peaceful reunification must be upheld.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China will set up a central leading group for advancing law-based governance. The move is aimed at helping build rule of law in China, President Xi Jinping said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

China will step up efforts to tackle subversion, terrorism, separatism and religious extremism, President Xi Jinping says. Xi said that maintaining national security is in the interests of all people.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Mexican state oil company Petroleos Mexicanos (Pemex) says it will rescind contracts held by several workers. Four workers were let go for links to oil theft from the center in the city of Salamanca. Pemex said it would file criminal complaints against the workers and investigate workers at others sites.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

China has zero tolerance for corruption within the ruling Communist Party, President Xi Jinping says. Xi has overseen a sweeping crackdown on corruption that has felled numerous high-ranking officials.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The One China principle must be maintained, President Xi Jinping says. He is referring to a core Chinese government policy that states Taiwan is part of China.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Panama will send an immigration and security delegation to China. The move is part of the lifting of visa restrictions for Chinese visitors. Chinese visitors to Panama will now need an electronic visa stamped in a consulate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China will let the market play a decisive role in resource allocation, President Xi Jinping says. Beijing has called for a greater role for market forces in the economy.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China will safeguard its sovereignty and security, President Xi Jinping says. Beijing considers self-ruled Taiwan a wayward province to be brought under its control by force.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Xi made the comments in a speech at the beginning of a Communist Party congress. China considers self-ruled Taiwan to be a wayward province.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The U.S. State Department approved the possible sale on Monday. Trump spoke of the potential sale following a meeting with Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsirpas.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras said on Tuesday it was important for Turkey to remain part of the NATO security alliance. He was speaking at a White House news conference after a meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. will help restore basic services after the fall of Islamic State, the State Department says. "We will assist and take, essentially, the lead in bringing back the water, electricity and all of that," a spokeswoman says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. condemns slaying of Maltese journalist Daphne Caruana Galizia. FBI has responded to Malta s request for assistance in investigating the car bomb attack. State Department spokeswoman Heather Nauert calls for thorough, transparent and independent probe.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The men, aged between 17 and 25, were arrested in Seine-Saint-Denis and Marseille. They were suspected of planning attacks on mosques, a court official said. More than 230 people have been killed in attacks by Islamist militants in France.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. military says it has received mixed accounts of the death toll in a clash on Monday between Iraqi and Kurdish forces. Between three and 11 fighters were killed in the clash, the military said. A spokesman for the coalition fighting Islamic State acknowledged limitations on the ability of the United States.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Part of a coal mine in Turkey s southeastern province of Sirnak collapsed on Tuesday. Search and rescue teams were looking for the missing worker who was trapped at the site. Energy ministry said the coal mine was unlicensed and had been operating illegally.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Ursula Haverbeck said at a public event in January 2016 that gas chambers in Auschwitz concentration camp were not real. Denying the Holocaust, in which six million Jews were killed, is a crime in Germany, punishable by up to five years in prison.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Britain will need 1,200 government officials to help register millions of European Union citizens. The legal status and rights of EU nationals is one of the thornier issues in Britain s complicated exit from the bloc. There are about three million EU citizens living in the UK.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China has set a clear direction on reform and opening up to the world, spokesman says. Tuo Zhen made the remarks at a briefing a day ahead of the opening of the key, twice-a-decade party congress.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Communist Party spokesman Tuo Zhen says anti-corruption fight is always on the road. Tuo made the comment at a briefing before the twice-a-decade meeting opens on Wednesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The detention of Catalan activists on Monday was a judicial, not a political, matter. On Monday, the court ordered that the heads of the pro-independence groups Catalan National Assembly (ANC) and Omnium be held.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The European Commission expressed its horror at the killing of a Maltese journalist in a car bombing. The Commission condemned the attack in the strongest terms possible. The right of a journalist to investigate, ask uncomfortable questions is at the heart of our values.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S.-backed militias have completely taken Syria s Raqqa from Islamic State, rights group says. The Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) has been fighting Islamic State inside Raqqa since June.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S.-backed Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) raise a militia flag inside Raqqa stadium. Stadium is one of the last remaining areas that were held by Islamic State in its former capital.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iraqi forces complete operation to take control of all oil fields operated by state-owned North Oil Company. Oil officials in Baghdad said all the fields were operating normally. The fields were previously held by Kurdish security forces known as Peshmerga.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kurdish Peshmerga forces pull out from the area of Khanaqin, on the border with Iran. The region is home to a large Kurdish community and the site of a small oil field.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S.-backed Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) in Syria s Raqqa. Spokesman says alliance will capture last parts of the city held by Islamic State.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov will meet Iranian Deputy Foreign minister Abbas Araqchi in Moscow this week. The focus is on the situation around the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

About 30 Islamist rebels holding an estimated 20 hostages remain in Marawi City. President Rodrigo Duterte s earlier declaration that the southern city had been liberated. The fight for the remaining ground forces continues.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Two Turkish soldiers were killed and two were wounded late on Monday in northern Iraq. The blast was caused by an improvised explosive device planted by PKK militants. The Turkish air force subsequently carried out air strikes in the same Zap region, killing eight PKK fighters.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The U.S. State Department said on Monday Washington was very concerned by reports of violence around the Iraqi oil city of Kirkuk. Kirkuk was seized by Baghdad s forces from Kurds.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The camps in al-Bayda province were being used to train new fighters. Islamic State has used ungoverned areas in Yemen to plot, direct, instigate, resource and recruit.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian President Vladimir Putin signs a decree imposing restrictions on North Korea. The measure is in response to a United Nations Security Council resolution. The resolution was a response to Pyongyang s missiles tests in late 2016.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Two leaders of Catalan separatist organizations remanded in custody. Jordi Sanchez and Jordi Cuixart remain under investigation on suspicion of sedition. Prosecutors allege they were key to planning an Oct. 1 referendum on independence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump says he believes Havana is responsible for a series of incidents. At least 22 diplomatic personnel were affected by the unexplained incidents. The United States has not formally concluded Cuba carried out the attacks, some of which involved high-pitched sounds.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. vows to use its economic and diplomatic power to support Venezuelans in restoring democracy. State Department spokeswoman Heather Nauert: "The voice of the Venezuelan people was not heard"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British Prime Minister Theresa May and European Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker agreed over dinner in Brussels on Monday. Describing the meeting which lasted around two hours as constructive and friendly.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Storm Ophelia brought dust from the Sahara and smoke from wild fires in southern Europe. Storm caused two deaths in Ireland, where it was the worst storm in half a century. While winds were moderate in the British capital, the yellow sky surprised Londoners.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Attorney General Raul Cervantes says he presented President Enrique Pena Nieto with his resignation. An intense political debate brews over the implementation of a new, autonomous anti-corruption system. Opposition lawmakers have objected to allowing Cervante to become the head of the new prosecutor general s office.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senator John McCain warns Iraq of severe consequences over any further misuse of U.S.-provided weaponry. The United States provided equipment and training to the government of Iraq to fight Islamic State.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. military said on Monday its commanders in Iraq were urging Iraqi and Kurdish forces to avoid escalation. Pentagon spokesman Colonel Robert Manning declined to speculate on whether the United States might cut off military aid and training to Iraqi forces.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
British Prime Minister Theresa May spoke to French President Macron. May and Macron discussed U.S. President Donald Trump s decision to not recertify the deal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Two Turkish soldiers killed in northern Iraq by an improvised explosive device. Turkish media previously reported that two soldiers were killed in southeastern province of Hakkari, near the Iraqi border.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Northern Ireland has been without a devolved administration since its collapse in January. May and Varadkar agreed in a phonecall that it was in the interests of everyone that the executive was restored.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Britain is concerned by the implications of U.S. President Donald Trump s decision not to recertify an international agreement on Iran's nuclear program.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Turkey agrees to close its air space to Kurdish-controlled northern Iraq. Work has started to hand over the main land border crossing into the autonomous region to the central Iraqi government.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Spain s state prosecutor has asked for a custodial sentence for the head of the Catalan police service. Josep Lluis Trapero is facing charges of sedition. He failed to order to rescue Civil Guard police who were trapped inside a Catalan government building in Barcelona.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The probability that Britain exits the European Union without having agreed a divorce deal has risen to 25 percent, compared with 15 percent previously.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A U.S.-trained Iraqi elite unit took control of the governorate building earlier in the day. They were welcomed by cheering crowds of Turkmen residents of the city.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkish security forces detained 1,210 people over the last week for suspected links to militant groups or last year s failed coup. A total of 947 of those were detained for suspected ties to the network of U.S.-based Muslim cleric Fethullah Gulen.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Spain s state prosecutor has asked for Catalonia s police chief to be held in custody without bail. A judge is due to decide on this later on Monday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Moscow had called on the two countries to use the opportunity to hold direct talks to try to narrow their differences over Pyongyang s missile programme. RIA, citing the head of the North Korean delegation, said Pyongyang had rejected the idea.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iraq will deploy troops to regain full control of the Kirkuk oil area and fields surrounding it. Kurdish forces following Erbil orders have deliberately evacuated oil workers from oilfields under its control in Kirkuk.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A dozen Humvees from the U.S.-trained Counter Terrorism Service arrived at the governorate building. They drove to the center of the city from airport which they had captured earlier in the day. Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi gave instructions that the Iraqi flag be hoisted on Kirkuk.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Ali Larijani, the speaker of the Iranian parliament, said on Monday that Tehran had a specific plan of action if the United States withdrew from the nuclear pact. He said Washington would regret any such decision.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Catalan head Carles Puigdemont failed on Monday to respond to an ultimatum to answer  yes or no. Madrid has now given him until Thursday to change his mind.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iraq has shut down 350,000 barrels per day of production from major fields Bai Hassan and Avana due to security concerns. Civilian workers were released following a build up of Iraqi military forces around the fields.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A field commander for the U.S.-backed Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) in Raqqa said the alliance was carrying out clearing operations against Islamic State. Ilham Ahmed, a senior Kurdish leader who co-chairs the SDF s political wing, said she expected the end of the Raqqa offensive to be announced within hours or days.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump will travel to Japan, South Korea, China, Vietnam, the Philippines and Hawaii. The trip comes amid rising tensions over North Korea s nuclear and missile programs. Trump will call on the international community to join together in maximizing pressure on North Korea.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S.-led anti-Islamic State coalition said an Iraqi-Kurdish clash was a misunderstanding. Coalition forces and advisors are not supporting Government of Iraq or Kurdistan Regional Government activities near Kirkuk, it said.
